mapper.sql: SELECT A.id AS board_id , A.subject , A.description , A.type , A.flag_push , A.flag_use , A.creator , DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS created_at , A.editor , DATE_FORMAT(A.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS updated_at , CASE WHEN (SELECT count(1) FROM zarangzill.tb_board_reply WHERE board_id = A.id) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS reply_yn FROM zarangzill.tb_board A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zarangzill.tb_board (subject, description, type, flag_push, flag_use, creator, created_at) VALUES (#{subject}, #{description}, #{type}, #{flag_push}, #{flag_use}, #{creator}, sysdate());
mapper.sql: FROM tb_board A Inner Join tb_channel B ON A.type_id = B.id Inner Join tb_channel_fan C ON B.id = C.channel_id
